title: EXCELLENT Up Stair House For Immediate Sale- ARLINGTON GROVE
details:
We have a super upstair house for immediate sale at Arlington grove - GATED COMMUNITY
1km to Thalawathugoda junction
12 perches land with upstair house 3 bedrooms with ac 2 bathrooms/fully fitted pantry/servants bathroom/store room.

quiet neighborhood. parking for 3 vehicles in the garden.

semi furnushed

seeing is believing...all docs in order

could be viewed on weekends only by appointment
Rs 25 million -
